name: thriftiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being careful with money or resources, especially by avoiding waste: The strong work ethic and thriftiness helped them to accumulate wealth quickly. His thriftiness is legendary. He flies economy class, and shops endlessly for bargains. See
thrifty
